source: Wyoming Department of Veterans Affairs and 211 Wyoming

resources.name: Wyoming Department of Veterans Affairs
resources.description: State agency providing accredited service officers for VA claims assistance, benefits counseling, housing referrals, employment support, and educational resources.

resources.name: 211 Wyoming
resources.description: Free information and referral service connecting Wyoming veterans to community resources including housing, employment, food assistance, mental health services, and benefits.

resources.name: Wyoming Veterans Housing Assistance Program
resources.description: Program providing affordable housing and emergency shelter for homeless and at-risk Wyoming veterans with case management support.

resources.name: Cheyenne Veterans Community Center
resources.description: Community center providing employment training, job placement assistance, food pantry, healthcare referrals, and peer support groups for Wyoming veterans.

resources.name: Wyoming Veterans Legal Clinic
resources.address: Laramie County Bar Building, Cheyenne, WY 82001
resources.description: Law clinic providing free legal assistance to veterans for VA claims, discharge upgrades, and benefits disputes.

resources.name: Wyoming Veterans Employment Services
resources.description: State employment program offering job training, job placement, and career counseling for Wyoming veterans.

resources.name: Laramie Veterans Outreach
resources.description: Community organization providing peer support, mental health counseling, employment assistance, and referral services for Laramie area veterans.

resources.name: Casper Veterans Support Services
resources.description: Organization providing emergency assistance, food pantry access, mental health referrals, and employment support for Casper area veterans.

resources.name: Veterans Crisis Line - Wyoming
resources.description: 24/7 crisis support for veterans experiencing mental health crises, suicidal thoughts, or emotional distress.

resources.name: VA Medical Center - Sheridan
resources.description: Federal VA medical facility providing healthcare, mental health services, and rehabilitation programs for Wyoming veterans.
